damage_kinetic.title: Kinyetic Damage
damage_kinetic.body: Kinyetic damage is gweat against shiewds, but poow against awmow.

damage_highexplosive.title: High Expwosive Damage
damage_highexplosive.body: High expwosive damage is gweat against awmow, but poow against shiewds.

damage_fragmentation.title: Fwagmentation Damage
damage_fragmentation.body:
Fwagmentation damage is vewy poow against both awmow and shiewds. Howevew, weapons deawing fwagmentation damage usuawwy have a vewy high DPS, making them devastating vs wightwy-awmowed, unshiewded tawgets such as wight fightews and missiwes.

It can awso be highwy effective against a ship whose awmow is stwipped away by battwe damage.

damage_energy.title: Enyewgy Damage
damage_energy.body: Enyewgy damage is equawwy effective against shiewds and awmow.

damage_other.title: Othew Damage
damage_other.body: This weapon is speciaw. In weawity, though, if you'we seeing this, it's pwobabwy a bug.

fleetPoints.title: Depwoyment points
fleetPoints.body: You nyeed avaiwabwe depwoyment points to depwoy youw wesewves into battwe. Wetweating ow wosing ships gives you back the points used to depwoy them.

commandPoints.title: Command Points
commandPoints.body:
You nyeed command points to cweate assignments and give diwect owdews to youw fweet.

Once you wun out, you won't be abwe to give any mowe owdews, but can stiww owdew youw fweet to engage the enyemy at wiww by cancewwing aww existing assignments.

You gain a few command points evewy time youw fowces captuwe an objective.

warroom.combatTime:
Time ewapsed with both fweets in contact with each othew.

The peak pewfowmance time of weinfowcements is weduced by hawf of the combat time.

tooltipCaptain.title: Assign Captain
tooltipCaptain.body: Assign a captain (youwsewf ow an officew) to this ship. The ship wiww benyefit fwom the captain's skiwws.

tooltipAdmin.body: Assign an adminyistwatow (ow youwsewf) to guvwn this cowony, which wiww then benyefit fwom the assignyed adminyistwatow's skiwws.

tooltipAdminNonPlayer.title: Adminyistwatow
tooltipAdminNonPlayer.body: This cowony is nyot guvwnyed by an adminyistwatow of any nyote.

tooltipGive.title: Stowe
tooltipGive.body: Twansfew this %s fwom youw fweet. Its combat weadinyess wiww wemain unchanged whiwe it's in stowage.

tooltipMothball.title: Mothbaww
tooltipMothball.body:
Mothbawwed %ss can't be used in combat ow wepaiwed, and do nyot pwovide any fuew, cawgo, ow pewsonnyew capacity.

Mothbawwing a ship wiww weduce its combat weadinyess to zewo; westowing it wiww wequiwe time and suppwies.

tooltipUnmothball.title: Mothbaww

Mothbawwed %ss can't be used in combat ow wepaiwed, and do nyot pwovide any fuew, cawgo, ow pewsonnyew capacity.

Westowing this ship's combat weadinyess aftew unmothbawwing it wiww consume %s suppwies uvw %s day(s).

tooltipScuttle.title: Scuttwe
tooltipScuttle.body: Stwip this %s of anything usefuw, gainying %d suppwies, %d fuew, and %d heavy machinyewy.

tooltipSuspendRepairs.title: Suspend Wepaiws & Wecuvwy
tooltipSuspendRepairs.body: Pwevents this %s fwom pewfowming wepaiws ow wecuvwing combat weadinyess. Fuww wepaiws and CW wecuvwy wiww consume appwoximatewy %s suppwies uvw %s days if awwowed to pwoceed.

tooltipSuspendRepairsNotNeeded.title: Suspend Wepaiws & Wecuvwy
tooltipSuspendRepairsNotNeeded.body: Pwevents this %s fwom pewfowming wepaiws ow wecuvwing combat weadinyess. This %s does nyot cuwwentwy wequiwe wepaiws ow CW wecuvwy.

tooltipLogisticalPriority.body: %ss with wogisticaw pwiowity get fiwst pick of cwew and suppwies avaiwabwe fow wepaiws.

misc.jumpPointNormal: Jump points can be used to twansit between hypewspace and nyowmaw space. Some jump points awso wead to othew destinyations.
misc.jumpPointStar: The gwavity weww of a staw is deep enyough to pwovide a onye-way exit fwom hypewspace. Using onye is, howevew, extwemewy difficuwt and dangewous.
